div.p: Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance codes. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-causativeagent
Import all the codes that are contained in https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-noallergy

description.value: Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance codes. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
